title: Welcome to Smart Talks with IBM and Malcolm Gladwell
itunes:title: Welcome to Smart Talks with IBM and Malcolm Gladwell
description:
The world's most challenging problems need smarter solutions. Join host Malcolm Gladwell as he interviews industry leaders and innovators to discover how IBM and its partners collaborate on projects that are designed to approach global issues in unconventional ways.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
